directions: In a large skillet, brown chicken on both sides. In the meantime, in a medium bowl combine the soup, milk and cheese. Mix together. When chicken is browned, pour mixture over chicken pieces. Cook over medium low heat until chicken is done and juices run clear. Serve.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup
6 slices American processed  cheese, cut into 1-inch pieces
title: Easy Cheesy Skillet Chicken
